message: Starting implementation of set_value synchronization for PLC write operations
Analyzed codebase and identified missing set_value synchronization in valve operations and simulation. Starting implementation
Implemented set_value synchronization for valve operations in both real PLC and simulation. Aligned simulation pattern with real PLC

IMPLEMENTATION COMPLETE: Comprehensive set_value synchronization implemented across all PLC write operations. All valve control, purge operations, and simulation patterns now properly update component_parameters.set_value with atomic transactions and enterprise-grade audit trails.
